org.exolab.castor.types
Class TimeInstant

java.lang.Object
  org.exolab.castor.types.RecurringDurationBase
      org.exolab.castor.types.RecurringDuration
          org.exolab.castor.types.TimeInstant
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TimeInstant
extends RecurringDuration

Describe an XML schema TimeInstant. The time type is derived from recurringDuration by setting up the facet:

  • duration to "P0Y"
  • period to "P0Y"

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Arnaud Blandin

RecurringDuration, Serialized Form
